document.topic_text: Home » Wilson signs with Wiley College Wilson signs with Wiley College By: Tuesday, May 10, 2016 BORGER, TX Frank Phillips basketball player Kyle Wilson recently signed his Letter of Intent to continue his basketball career with Wiley College. For more information see Wednesday's sports section of the Borger News-Herald. Category: What's your favorite Mother's Day gift?
